name: David Letterman
monologue: President Obama’s uncle was arrested for a DUI. His alcohol level was actually higher than Obama’s approval rating.

name: David Letterman
monologue: Top Ten President Obama Labor Day Weekend Plans

name: Jay Leno
monologue: The White House agreed to move President Obama’s speech from Wednesday to Thursday because the Republicans have a debate scheduled for Wednesday. So the debate that no one is going to watch holds more weight than the speech no one is going to believe.

name: Jay Leno
monologue: Obama caved again when “Real Housewives of New Jersey” called and said, “Our show is on at that time.”

name: Jay Leno
monologue: Dick Cheney’s book is an inside look at what it’s like to be president — uh, vice president.

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: After pressure from Republicans, President Obama moved his big jobs speech from Wednesday to Thursday night. Obama gave in when he realized something important: He could just TiVo “Jersey Shore.”

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: President Obama has declared that September is National Childhood Obesity Awareness Month. And if you’re looking for a way to celebrate, I recommend the “Mac n’ Cheese Big Daddy Patty” from Denny’s.

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: A new survey found that half of all American employees have faked a sick day. While the other half have just lied on a survey.

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: A new study found that thin people have an extra copy of certain genes. Meanwhile, fat people have an extra copy of the Denny’s takeout menu.
